data.eml:eml: Type material of Platyhelminthes (Monogenoidea) housed in the Helminthological Collection of the Oswaldo Cruz Institute / FIOCRUZ (CHIOC), Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, from 1979 to 2016

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lopes, Daniela A., Mainenti, Adriana, Sanches, Magda, Knoff, Marcelo, Gomes, Delir Correa (2016): Type material of Platyhelminthes (Monogenoidea) housed in the Helminthological Collection of the Oswaldo Cruz Institute / FIOCRUZ (CHIOC), Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, from 1979 to 2016. ZooKeys 616: 1-75, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.616.8481, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.616.8481
